column4: type and enter /j #ubuntu-ru         Not Ubuntu-ru. beginning with lowercase
You are in the #ubuntu-ru room now. Can't you write? I wrote "hello" and it went to the room. Do you mean you can not write in Kril alphabet?
There are two possibilities: Either you or someone with your nickname is recently banned from that channel or Russion channel wants you to register your nickname. First possibility is more probable.
it is not first, because i can see the messages from other users. And not second too

Whether there is an Ukrainian channel? Maybe i can write there. Because my English........

Do you mean in Russian language?
haha. They do not understand you
Russians say that there is no Ukranian channel and they invite you there! :-)
Try to login again with a different nick and join there again.
